ch0161_00_hara/0101_0701_01_10:
Ho, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m pleased
to see you here again today.
ch0161_00_hara/0101_0701_02_10:
Working together with your partner will take you
places! I’m looking forward to seeing where you’ll
end up!
ch0161_00_hara/0601_0701_01_10:
To do an island challenge means you’ll see things
that’ll make you think!
ch0161_00_hara/0601_0701_02_10:
You’ll meet people and Pokémon...and may
encounter some things that can’t be seen.
ch0161_00_hara/0601_0701_03_10:
The more you think about these things, the stronger
your mind and body will become!
ch0161_00_hara/0602_0701_01_10:
Have you seen any Trainers around here from a
region that has some form of wrestling in
their culture?
ch0161_00_hara/0602_0701_02_10:
If you have, I would like to do a few bouts of
Alolan sumo with them.
ch0161_00_hara/0602_0701_03_10:
I’d also like you to watch my matches. They may
inspire you to learn more about the sport!
ch0161_00_hara/0603_0701_01_10:
Watching you as you go about exploring Pasio
reminds me of my grandson, Hau.
ch0161_00_hara/0603_0701_02_10:
Just like you, he went on his journey and grew
tremendously.
ch0161_00_hara/0603_0701_03_10: He got so good at battling, he even beat me!
ch0161_00_hara/0604_0701_01_10: In Alola, each island has its own totem Pokémon.
ch0161_00_hara/0604_0701_02_10:
They are important to us because they protect
the islands, but there are other kinds of
relationships that act the same way.
ch0161_00_hara/0604_0701_03_10:
For example, I believe a sync pair bond between
a Trainer and their Pokémon is one of the
strongest relationships you can have.
ch0161_00_hara/0604_0701_04_10:
As long as you trust and care about each other,
you can overcome any obstacles in your way.
ch0161_00_hara/0604_0701_05_10: At least, that’s what this old man thinks!
ch0161_00_hara/0605_0701_01_10:
I hear that you’ve been a good influence to a lot
of folks here, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0161_00_hara/0605_0701_02_10:
Of course, I’m sure you’re also learning from them
as well.
ch0161_00_hara/0605_0701_03_10:
Many sync pairs coming together and influencing
each other will change and shape Pasio.
ch0161_00_hara/0605_0701_04_10:
I love imagining what the island will look like in
the future!
ch0161_00_hara/1701_0701_01_10: Do you have a moment? I’d like you to have this.
ch0161_00_hara/1701_0701_02_10: It’s bound to be helpful on your journey!
ch0161_00_hara/1701_0702_01_10:
I’ll let you know if I find anything else that you
could use.
ch0161_00_hara/2501_0701_01_10:
When I travel around Pasio, I always feel just how
vast the world really is.
ch0161_00_hara/2501_0701_02_10:
Every time I meet and battle a strong opponent, 
old Hala can’t help but want to holler!
ch0161_00_hara/2501_0701_03_10:
The last time I felt like this was when I set out on
my island challenge as a young boy!
ch0161_00_hara/2501_0701_04_10:
What I experienced then is what made me the man
I am today!
ch0161_00_hara/2501_0702_01_10:
You should go on adventures to see the world and
broaden your horizons while you’re still young.
ch0161_00_hara/2501_0702_02_10: I will support you as much as I can!
ch0161_00_hara/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m embarrassed to say this, but I have a student
who became a delinquent.
ch0161_00_hara/2511_0701_02_10:
He was too arrogant and misused his power.
But despite that foolishness, I’m determined to
retrain him properly!
ch0161_00_hara/2511_0701_03_10:
This time, I’ll train him so that he can be a
full-fledged Trainer.
ch0161_00_hara/2511_0701_04_10:
When the time comes, I may need your
cooperation. I’d appreciate your help!
ch0161_00_hara/2511_0702_01_10:
When you’re feeling lost or worried, just remember
the faces of the people who helped you get where
you are now.
ch0161_00_hara/2511_0702_02_10:
If you do that, it might help you stay on the right
path even when you’re about to be led astray.
ch0161_00_hara/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s keep shining together even brighter than
the rising sun!
ch0161_00_hara/3003_0701_01_10:
Seeing you children running around the island
sure reminds me of Alola!
ch0161_00_hara/3005_0701_01_10:
If you’re scared of the dark, being around 
people and Pokémon who shine like the moon
might help.
